mapper.insert: insert into gm_user (username, real_name, password, e_mail,phone_number, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{username},#{realName},#{password},#{eMail},#{phoneNumber},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModified})
mapper.update: UPDATE gm_user SET head_image = #{imagePath} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE gm_user SET password = #{newPwd} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from gm_user where username = #{username}
select password from gm_user where username = #{username}
SELECT password FROM gm_user WHERE id = #{id}
